name: Acrobatic, Mythic

sections.body: The bonus on Acrobatics and Fly skill checks from Acrobatic increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat an Acrobatics or Fly check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your grace and fluidity are beyond compare.
